combatEffectTemplates.description: An effect that applies stacks of modifiers. Stacks are increased by 1 each time the character misses with an attack. The effect is removed if the character hits with an attack, or combat ends.

combatPassives.name: Air Vulnerability
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% more damage from Air Spells and takes 10% more damage while affected by Frostburn.

combatPassives.name: Air Resistance
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% less damage from Air Spells and has a 50% Chance to ignore Frostburn.

combatPassives.name: Water Vulnerability
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% more damage from Water Spells and takes 10% more damage while Frozen.

combatPassives.name: Water Resistance
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% less damage from Water Spells and has a 50% Chance to ignore Freeze.

combatPassives.name: Earth Vulnerability
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% more damage from Earth Spells and takes 10% more damage while Bleeding.

combatPassives.name: Earth Resistance
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% less damage from Earth Spells and has a 50% Chance to ignore Bleed.

combatPassives.name: Fire Vulnerability
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% more damage from Fire Spells and takes 10% more damage while Burning.

combatPassives.name: Fire Resistance
combatPassives.customDescription: The Enemy takes 50% less damage from Fire Spells and has a 50% Chance to ignore Burn.

combatPassives.name: Shadowy
combatPassives.customDescription: Your Damage Reduction is reduced by 5 and the Enemy Regens 1% of its Maximum HP at the end of its turns.

combatPassives.name: World Boss
combatPassives.customDescription: When fighting a World Boss, the boss has 100x its normal Hit Points. Additionally, your Critical Damage is tripled and you gain +10% Combat XP.

combatPassives.name: Shadow Touch I
combatPassives.customDescription: All Enemy stats are weakened by 10% (Attack Interval, Accuracy, Damage Dealt, Damage Taken, Global Evasion, Max HP, HP Regen, and Prayer Point Cost).

combatPassives.name: Shadow Touch II
combatPassives.customDescription: All stats are weakened by 15% (Attack Interval, Accuracy, Damage Dealt, Damage Taken, Global Evasion, Max HP, HP Regen, and Prayer Point Cost).

combatPassives.name: Shadow Touch III
combatPassives.customDescription: All stats are weakened by 20% (Attack Interval, Accuracy, Damage Dealt, Damage Taken, Global Evasion, Max HP, HP Regen, and Prayer Point Cost).

combatPassives.name: Nightmarish Touch
combatPassives.customDescription: 15% On Hit to apply Sleep for 2 turns. If Sleeping, 50% chance On Hit to apply Fear for 2 turns.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Alien
combatPassives.customDescription: Aliens apply Confusion (+2% of remaining Hitpoints taken as damage on a successful attack (once per turn, capped at 10K damage)) for 3 turns at the Start of the Fight.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Beast
combatPassives.customDescription: Beasts have +5% Lifesteal.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Construct
combatPassives.customDescription: Constructs are immune to Poison and Bleed.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Celestial
combatPassives.customDescription: Celestials regenerate 10% of their health at the end of each of their turns for the first 5 turns at the Start of the Fight.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Dragonkin
combatPassives.customDescription: Dragonkin are 50% resistant to Burn and 100% resistant to Dragonbreath.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Elemental
combatPassives.customDescription: Elementals have +10% Global Evasion.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Fiend
combatPassives.customDescription: Fiends are immune to Curses.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Giant
combatPassives.customDescription: Giants have +20% Maximum Hitpoints.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Humanoid
combatPassives.customDescription: Humanoids are Lucky (their attacks roll twice and take the higher result).

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Monstrosity
combatPassives.customDescription: Monstrosities have a 20% chance to inflict Fear for 2 turns at the Start of the Fight.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Myth
combatPassives.customDescription: Myths have a 20% chance to Dodge Magic Attacks.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Plant
combatPassives.customDescription: Plants are immune to Sleep and Regen 5x as fast, but take 2x as much damage from Burn.

combatPassives.name: Monster Type: Undead
combatPassives.customDescription: Undead are immune to Sleep and Poison, and have a 10% chance upon dying to be rebirthed with 100% of their Hitpoints.

items.name: Magic Mastery Cape

items.name: Prayer Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: -50% Prayer Point Cost and Bones are automatically buried for 5x their Prayer Point value

items.name: Legendary Sigil of Generosity
items.customDescription:
On a Hit, if you are afflicted by certain negative effects, also give them to the Enemy.
Valid Effects: Burn, Bleed, Deadly Poison, Drowsy, Fear, Freeze, Frostburn, Poison, Sleep, Slow, and Stun.

items.name: Sigil of Blight (Greater)

attacks.name: Draining Swipe
attacks.description: On a hit gives the enemy -${onHitEffect0modValue0}% Maximum Hit (stacking up to 9 times) until the end of combat.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: On a hit <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Dark Howl
attacks.description: The shadowhound lets out a chilling howl, giving the enemy +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Accuracy Rating and +${preHitEffect0modValue1}% Max Hit, and for ${preHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turn(s). Additionally, ${preHitEffect1chance}% chance to inflict Fear for ${preHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turn(s). If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> <attis> lets out a chilling howl, <prehitEffect>. If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.

attacks.name: Strike from the Shadows
attacks.description: The enemy slinks into and melds with the shadows, giving the enemy +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Critical Hit Chance and +${preHitEffect0modValue1}% Critical Damage for ${preHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turn(s). If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> <attis> surrounded by shadows, <prehitEffect>. If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.

attacks.name: Shadowstep
attacks.description: The enemy is surrounded by shadows, giving the enemy +${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Global Evasion, +${preHitEffect0modValue1}% Damage Reduction, and +${preHitEffect0modValue2}% Critical Hit Chance for ${preHitEffect0turns} of the enemy's turn(s). If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> <attis> surrounded by shadows, <prehitEffect>. If buff is already active, perform a regular attack instead.

attacks.name: Shadowgrasp
attacks.description: ${hitCount} large, shadowy tendrils reach out to grasp you, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage each. They give you -${preHitEffect0modValue0}% Global Accuracy that stacks up to ${preHitEffect0maxStacks} times.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <count> large, shadowy tendrils reach out to grasp you, dealing <damage> damage each. On use, <prehitEffect>.

attacks.name: Heavy Shot
attacks.description: Perform a heavy ranged attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Perform an attack that does <damage>.

attacks.name: Blood Tithe
attacks.description: Your melee attack heals you for ${lifesteal}% of the damage dealt.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <AttPos> attack heals <attacker> for <lifesteal> of the damage dealt.

attacks.name: Elemental Breath
attacks.description: Breathe unavoidable elemental dragonfire that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}x${hitCount} damage over ${duration}s. Inflicts either Burn, Freeze, Sleep, or Stun (10% chance each).
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Breathe <avoidable> elemental dragonfire that deals <damage>x<count> damage over <duration>. <HitEffect>.

attacks.name: Harpiar's Song
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% normal damage each hit (unavoidable if Accuracy Rating is greater than or equal to 20,000). On hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply sleep for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times, dealing <damage> each hit (<avoidable> if Accuracy Rating is 20,000+). On hit, <hitEffect>.

attacks.name: Flame_Lash
attacks.description: The enemy lashes out with a fiery whip ${hitCount} times, dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of its Magic level + 1, with a 50% chance to has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict Burn that deals ${onHitEffect0DamageMaxValue0}% of the your current hitpoints as damage over ${onHitEffect0duration}s on hit.

attacks.name: Rollin' Rollin'

attacks.descriptionGenerator: The <attacker> rolls <attPos> body around like a massive boulder, dealing <damage> and <hitEffect> on hit.

attacks.name: One-Two Punch
attacks.description: Attack ${hitCount} times, dealing up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage on the first attack and up to ${attackDamageMaxValue1}% of your max hit on the second attack. Has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to strike with a Sucker Punch, stunning the enemy for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn
attacks.descriptionGenerator: Attack <count> times, dealing <damage>, <hitEffect>

monsters.name: Big Golbin
monsters.description: Is this really a golbin...?

monsters.name: Peasant Man
monsters.description: Just a regular ol' bloke.

monsters.name: Peasant Woman
monsters.description: Just a regular ol' gal.

monsters.name: Pickpocket
monsters.description: Cor blimey, mate! What is he doin' in me pockets?!

monsters.name: Guard
monsters.description: Why do they always have ugly helmets?

monsters.name: Executioner
monsters.description: Sure wouldn't want to commit any crimes 'round him!

monsters.name: Mysterious Monk
monsters.description: Mysterious.

monsters.name: Golbin Chief
monsters.description: “Reek-reek! Shmig blig. Dorgoo!”

monsters.name: Novice Necromancer
monsters.description: Probably still lives in his mum's basement.

monsters.name: Giant Grub
monsters.description: YUCK!

monsters.name: Sandy Devil
monsters.description: Nothing worse than getting sand in your eyes.

monsters.name: Lost Monkey
monsters.description: If only I had a banana...

monsters.name: Monk of the Wind
monsters.description: “Long may the Winds carry gentle Aeris’ name.”

monsters.name: Monk of the River
monsters.description: “The Tide ebbs and flows; Glacia’s power grows.”

monsters.name: Monk of the Moss
monsters.description: “Can’t you feel the embrace of Terran as you walk?”

monsters.name: Monk of the Flame
monsters.description: “The rage inside you belongs to Ragnar.”

monsters.name: Guardian of the Elements
monsters.description: “I CONTAIN THAT WHICH BINDS MELVOR.”

pets.name: Swirli
pets.hint: Obtained from Guardian of the Elements

categories.name: Shrubs
categories.description: A good place to grow berries, beans, and the like.
categories.seedNotice: Shrub seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 2 in your bank.

categories.name: Flowers
categories.description: Beautiful flowers to enhance your crops.
categories.seedNotice: Flower seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 5 in your bank.

categories.seedNotice: Hops seeds will only show if you have the level requirement, and at least 3 in your bank.
